body_html: Control dependencies only affect operations created within the control dependencies block. Because a_cpu was created outside of that block, it can evaluate before update_op has executed. a_cpu_to_gpu is created within the block, so it's guaranteed to run after update_op
body_text: Control dependencies only affect operations created within the control dependencies block. Because a_cpu was created outside of that block, it can evaluate before update_op has executed. a_cpu_to_gpu is created within the block, so it's guaranteed to run after update_op
body: Control dependencies only affect operations created within the control dependencies block. Because `a_cpu` was created outside of that block, it can evaluate before `update_op` has executed. `a_cpu_to_gpu` is created within the block, so it's guaranteed to run after update_op
